name: obsidian-vault-size-history-plugin
description: This is Vault Size History plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.build-install: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && sh scripts/install.sh

author: architect@technerium.com
